statements: SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM game_events;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_type='Tournament';
SELECT event_name, reward_description FROM game_events WHERE event_type='Challenge';
SELECT event_name, event_type, reward_description FROM game_events ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'Puzzle'
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM game_events ORDER BY event_name DESC
SELECT event_name, reward_description FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'Action' ORDER BY event_name ASC
SELECT challenge_description FROM game_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Riddle%'
SELECT event_id, event_name, challenge_description, reward_description FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'Adventure'
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_id, challenge_name FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name FROM rewards WHERE challenge_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_description FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 2;
SELECT challenge_id, COUNT(*) AS reward_count FROM rewards GROUP BY challenge_id HAVING reward_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM rewards JOIN challenges ON rewards.challenge_id = challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'XP' ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 3;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_id, challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty < 2 ORDER BY challenge_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_coins > 1000;
SELECT rewards.reward_name, rewards.reward_value, players.player_name FROM rewards JOIN players ON rewards.player_id = players.player_id ORDER BY rewards.reward_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level, start_date, end_date FROM challenges;
SELECT player_name, player_level, last_login FROM players;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players;
SELECT challenge_id, reward_name, reward_type, reward_value FROM rewards;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level, start_date, end_date FROM challenges ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level, registration_date, last_login FROM players WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT challenge_name, reward_name, reward_value, is_claimed FROM challenges JOIN rewards ON challenges.challenge_id = rewards.challenge_id ORDER BY reward_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, challenge_name, progress_percentage, completed_date FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id ORDER BY completed_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT player_name, challenge_name, progress_percentage FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE progress_percentage < 100 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, game_id, created_at FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT game_name, developer_id, release_date FROM games WHERE developer_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_timestamp FROM events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, game_id FROM challenges WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE developer_id = 10;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_timestamp FROM events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
